guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: If you use a club with a lot of backspin you can go straight on the green. Have your second bounce up towards the pin. Stay away from the bunker and the rough.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 268 534 L 244 226" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="268" cy="534" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="244" cy="226" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 213 594 L 244 226" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="213" cy="594" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="244" cy="226" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 152 654 L 244 226" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="152" cy="654" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="244" cy="226" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: Use 6 bars of backspin combined with 5 in left sidespin. Use the slope on the right side of the green and let it roll down to the pin. This way is probably your best chance at a hole in one.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 268 534 L 261 218" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="268" cy="534" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="261" cy="218" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 213 594 L 261 218" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="213" cy="594" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="261" cy="218" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 152 654 L 261 218" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="152" cy="654" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="261" cy="218" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Yellow Path
guides.text: Use 4 bars of backspin to bounce it right to the pin. Keep in mind that there's a big hump on the green which will make it hard to get the ball in the hole.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 268 534 L 225 217" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="268" cy="534" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="225" cy="217" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 213 594 L 225 217" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="213" cy="594" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="225" cy="217" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 152 654 L 225 217" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="152" cy="654" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="225" cy="217" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="215" cy="244" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 100 300 L 215 244" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/Christmas/annotations/1-Green.png" x="0" y="200" width="200" height="200" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: The fairway slopes from left to right so use left sidespin and a small amount of curl. Try to find the right pocket on the right side of the fairway. This approach will give you a shorter approach to the green. Bounce your second shot over the bunker. It's uphill to the green from there so it's important to not use that much backspin or you may find your ball falling back down into the bunker.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 192 846 L 288 368" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 288 368 L 154 175" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="192" cy="846" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="288" cy="368" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="154" cy="175" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 169 899 L 288 368" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 288 368 L 154 175" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="169" cy="899" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="288" cy="368" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="154" cy="175" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 138 966 L 288 368" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 288 368 L 154 175" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="138" cy="966" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="288" cy="368" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="154" cy="175" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: A similar approach to the Black Path but you can find the shorter pocket on the right side of the fairway. This means you'll absolutely need all the distance you can get out of your wood.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 192 846 L 304 419" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 304 419 L 144 179" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="192" cy="846" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="304" cy="419" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="144" cy="179" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 169 899 L 304 419" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 304 419 L 144 179" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="169" cy="899" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="304" cy="419" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="144" cy="179" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 138 966 L 304 419" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 304 419 L 144 179" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="138" cy="966" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="304" cy="419" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="144" cy="179" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="135" cy="158" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 350 100 L 135 158" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/Christmas/annotations/2-Green.png" x="250" y="0" width="200" height="200" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the way to play if you don't get tailwind. Place your drive up towards the bunker but you don't have to get close since you won't be able to reach the green with your second shot anyway. Place your second shot before the center fairway bunker to give yourself a chance to chip in for an eagle. Use the back of the green to roll your shot back down to the hole.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 201 886 L 196 481" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 196 481 L 226 194" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 226 194 L 193 92" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="201" cy="886" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="196" cy="481" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="226" cy="194" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="193" cy="92" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 199 932 L 196 481" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 196 481 L 226 194" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 226 194 L 193 92" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="199" cy="932" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="196" cy="481" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="226" cy="194" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="193" cy="92" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 196 978 L 196 481" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 196 481 L 226 194" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 226 194 L 193 92" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="196" cy="978" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="196" cy="481" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="226" cy="194" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="193" cy="92" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: If you catch a tailwind use a Titan / Kingmaker / Berserker to bounce over the bunker. You NEED a lot of topspin on your driver. From the second fairway you can go directly onto the green. The approach shot will work best with The Guardian in your bag.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 201 886 L 202 478" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 202 478 L 219 350" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 219 350 L 189 98" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="201" cy="886" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="202" cy="478" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="219" cy="350" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="189" cy="98" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 199 932 L 202 478" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 202 478 L 219 350" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 219 350 L 189 98" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="199" cy="932" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="202" cy="478" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="219" cy="350" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="189" cy="98" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 196 978 L 202 478" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 202 478 L 219 350" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 219 350 L 189 98" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="196" cy="978" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="202" cy="478" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="219" cy="350" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="189" cy="98" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="193" cy="113" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 87 237 L 193 113" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/Christmas/annotations/3-Green.png" x="0" y="150" width="175" height="175" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: Use a long iron (or wood for Masters). Use 1 - 1.5 bars of backspin and 1 bar of sidespin if you get a left to right wind and no sidespin if you get a right to left wind. Stay away from the left side of the green as it will make your ball roll down and leave you with a tricky putt.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 195 495 L 225 204" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="195" cy="495" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="225" cy="204" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 190 585 L 225 204" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="190" cy="585" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="225" cy="204" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 186 680 L 225 204" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="680" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="225" cy="204" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: Only play this way with a headwind or straight sidewind. Otherwise you will be between clubs. Use a wood with a good amount of backspin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 195 495 L 205 173" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="195" cy="495" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="205" cy="173" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 190 585 L 205 173" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="190" cy="585" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="205" cy="173" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 186 680 L 205 173" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="680" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="205" cy="173" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="186" cy="167" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 87 317 L 186 167" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/Christmas/annotations/4-Green.png" x="0" y="230" width="175" height="175" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: Aim you drive just before the bunker on the right. Bounce it over with max topspin to the fairway. That will leave you with a short iron to the green. Keep in mind that the tree is in play by the second bunker on the left.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 254 630 C 281 428 281 428 278 298" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 278 298 L 263 166" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 263 166 L 139 96" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="254" cy="630" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="278" cy="298" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="263" cy="166" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="139" cy="96" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 259 673 C 281 428 281 428 278 298" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 278 298 L 263 166" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 263 166 L 139 96" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="259" cy="673" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="278" cy="298" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="263" cy="166" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="139" cy="96" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 264 720 C 281 428 281 428 278 298" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 278 298 L 263 166" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 263 166 L 139 96" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="264" cy="720" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="278" cy="298" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="263" cy="166" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="139" cy="96" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="147" cy="109" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 87 237 L 147 109" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/Christmas/annotations/5-Green.png" x="0" y="150" width="175" height="175" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: It's recommended to only play this way with sidewind or tailwind. Use topspin to let your drive fall over the cliff and roll down to the fairway. It may seem difficult but is easier than trying to keep it up on the top fairway. For you second shot you can bounce over the bunker or go to the right of the bunker.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 165 894 L 174 415" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 174 415 L 152 377" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 152 377 L 223 134" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="165" cy="894" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="174" cy="415" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="152" cy="377" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="223" cy="134" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 168 942 L 174 415" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 174 415 L 152 377" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 152 377 L 223 134" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="168" cy="942" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="174" cy="415" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="152" cy="377" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="223" cy="134" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 171 992 L 174 415" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 174 415 L 152 377" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 152 377 L 223 134" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="171" cy="992" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="174" cy="415" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="152" cy="377" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="223" cy="134" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is a trickier way to play it. It's more common to play this way in Masters than from other tees. Bounce your drive in the rough with max topspin and let it roll down to the left. From there you can bounce it over the bunker in front of the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 165 894 C 172 592 172 592 139 431" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 139 431 L 106 383" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 106 383 L 201 154" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="165" cy="894" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="139" cy="431" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="106" cy="383" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="201" cy="154" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="198" cy="139" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 87 237 L 198 139" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/Christmas/annotations/6-Green.png" x="0" y="150" width="175" height="175" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: You'll have no problem reaching the green playing your teeshot to the right. Don't use max topspin on your drive. From there you will have to use a small amount of curl (more if the wind is right to left), max right sidespin and a few bars of backspin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 146 848 C 127 663 127 663 153 498" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 153 498 L 183 387" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 183 387 C 140 239 140 239 153 146" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="146" cy="848" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="153" cy="498" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="183" cy="387" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="153" cy="146" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 147 885 C 127 663 127 663 153 498" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 153 498 L 183 387" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 183 387 C 140 239 140 239 153 146" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="147" cy="885" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="153" cy="498" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="183" cy="387" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="153" cy="146" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 148 923 C 127 663 127 663 153 498" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 153 498 L 183 387" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 183 387 C 140 239 140 239 153 146" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="148" cy="923" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="153" cy="498" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="183" cy="387" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="153" cy="146" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: Take this path when you get wind that is to the left off the tee. Don't use too much left sidespin or you'll risk going into the rough. The second shot is a straight one bouncing over the bunker in front of the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 146 848 C 170 634 170 634 142 493" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 142 493 L 107 341" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 107 341 L 144 142" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="146" cy="848" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="142" cy="493" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="107" cy="341" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="144" cy="142" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 147 885 C 170 634 170 634 142 493" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 142 493 L 107 341" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 107 341 L 144 142" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="147" cy="885" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="142" cy="493" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="107" cy="341" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="144" cy="142" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.svg: <path d="M 148 923 C 170 634 170 634 142 493" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 142 493 L 107 341" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 107 341 L 144 142" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="148" cy="923" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="142" cy="493" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="107" cy="341" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="144" cy="142" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="168" cy="128" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 272 237 L 168 128" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/Christmas/annotations/7-Green.png" x="185" y="150" width="175" height="175" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: Use a wood or long iron to go directly to the green. Be sure to use a club with a lot of backspin. That will let your ball ride the slope on the right side of the green and let it slide down to the pin. This isn't an option without enough backspin on your club.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 240 578 L 241 233" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="240" cy="578" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="241" cy="233" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 199 664 L 241 233" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="199" cy="664" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="241" cy="233" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 155 752 L 241 233" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="155" cy="752" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="241" cy="233" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is a very tricky shot. Don't use any backspin since the fairway slopes severely from left to right. Let the ball bounce over to the green and it will fall down to the pin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 240 578 L 223 267" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="240" cy="578" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="223" cy="267" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 199 664 L 223 267" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="199" cy="664" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="223" cy="267" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 155 752 L 223 267" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="155" cy="752" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="223" cy="267" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="217" cy="232" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 100 425 L 217 232" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/Christmas/annotations/8-Green.png" x="0" y="325" width="200" height="200" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is not an easy hole. Use a small amount of left curl and some left sidespin on your drive. Place your ball up as close to the end of the fairway as possible. It you go short you will NOT be able to reach the platform on your next shot. Bounce your second shot off the platform with 3 bars of backspin. Should be a good chance for an albatross.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 187 806 C 154 519 154 519 100 345" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 100 345 C 217 257 217 257 283 156" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="187" cy="806" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="100" cy="345" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="283" cy="156" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 191 854 C 154 519 154 519 100 345" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 100 345 C 217 257 217 257 283 156" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="191" cy="854" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="100" cy="345" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="283" cy="156" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 194 903 C 154 519 154 519 100 345" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 100 345 C 217 257 217 257 283 156" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="194" cy="903" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="100" cy="345" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="283" cy="156" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is a much trickier drive but if you succeed, you'll have a much easier second shot to the green. You need to avoid the rough and the bunker. Use 4 - 6 bars of topsin to bounce over or a little less with tailwind. Second shot is played the same way as the Black Path. Use the platform in front of the green.
